trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_SEQ_00<tab>Sphene is eager to tell Malachite of your success.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Malachite.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_TODO_02<tab>Search the area for the simulant.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_GULOOLJA_000_000<tab>I'm glad I'm the way I am. It's my parents' gift to me, and how I was able to learn more about them─and about myself.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_010<tab>I believe that takes care of the deliveries. Thank you for taking charge, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_011<tab>From what I've seen and heard, 'tis plain the people held their queen in high regard. And the simulant has exploited their love and admiration to win over so very many...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_012<tab>Come, let us report to Malachite. He should be back at the north of the recreation zone.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_WUKLAMAT_000_013<tab>Done with your deliveries? We've just gotten back ourselves.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_GULOOLJA_000_014<tab>Malachite seems to be doing better.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_015<tab>Those we spoke with all harbored anxiety towards death. 'Tis hardly an unnatural sentiment to have, and yet...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_MALACHITE_000_020<tab>Thank you for your assistance. With this, every delivery I had planned for today is accounted for.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_MALACHITE_000_021<tab>The reactions I received were...mixed. While some were glad, others decided they did not want the items after all. How was your experience?

TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_GULOOLJA_000_022<tab>Everyone accepted their items, but they all felt differently about them. One person couldn't remember the keepsake's owner, and another couldn't stop worrying about their own death.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_MALACHITE_000_023<tab>I see. It's difficult indeed to predict how people may behave when confronted with reminders of loss.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_MALACHITE_000_024<tab>...Of late, I've come to believe that we are each of us the sum of the moments we've shared with our loved ones.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_MALACHITE_000_025<tab>And when they passed away, and we lost our memories of these people...we lost a part of ourselves. It's a thought that saddens me to no end...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_MALACHITE_000_026<tab>If our memories of the departed are no longer to be entrusted to the cloud, I wish that those already taken could be returned to us...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_MALACHITE_000_027<tab>Well, my friends, I must resume my formal duties. My thanks again for your aid.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_028<tab>Malachite speaks true─our memories are what define us. They form the path we walked to be where we are.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_029<tab>My Endless self, I expect, was much alike to me in the beginning.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_030<tab>But I cannot become like her no more than she could become like me. For once our paths diverged, so too did our lives and experiences.

TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_WUKLAMAT_000_031<tab>That's true... Even if we start from the same place, we all have different journeys. At some point, things like our goals and our ways of thinking are bound to change.

TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_032<tab>The Endless Sphene was one possibility. A version of myself who made choices I want to believe I never would. I'm beginning to come to terms with the fact I <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var>, though.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_WUKLAMAT_000_033<tab>Huh? Is that...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_034<tab>The simulant!?
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>She was looking straight at us... If I didn't know better, I'd say she wanted us to follow her.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_WUKLAMAT_000_036<tab>I have a bad feeling about this, but we might not have another chance to figure out what she's up to. We're going after her, right?
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_GULOOLJA_000_037<tab>That was my first time seeing the simulant. Though she was smiling, something about her scared me...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_038<tab>'Tis a strange feeling, pursuing one's spitting image. Where does she want us to go, I wonder...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>The simulant headed into the street over there.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_WUKLAMAT_000_041<tab>The Neon Stein is that way... Let's hurry.
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_WUKLAMAT_000_042<tab>Did we lose her!?
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_GULOOLJA_000_043<tab>I don't like this...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_044<tab>What is she up to...?
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_WUKLAMAT_000_050<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_GULOOLJA_000_051<tab>What a cruel thing to say to Sphene...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_060<tab>Are you all right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_061<tab>Forgive me. I was once able to use healing spells, but my long slumber appears to have sapped my magical reserves...
TEXT_KINGMH104_05302_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_062<tab><sigh> It's frustrating to be so powerless...but perhaps I must accept my newfound limitations...
